attributes.action: Make the use of “Bots” illegal for highly sought after or collectible items.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to do this as collectors & genuine buyers are having to pay extremely inflated prices for items they want wether it be for gifts or personal collections !
Trainer, Disney collectibles, clothing, make up etc .... the list goes on ! All bought buy bots to make HUGE profits !
attributes.background: I would like the government to make the use of “bots” to be made illegal. Highly sought after items & collectibles are being bought buy scalpers and sold for 10x the original price on selling sites !
